titleStmt.title: A holy oyl; and, a sweet perfume taken out of the sanctuary of the most sacred scriptures : in allusion to those mentioned, Exod. chap. 30 vers. 22. to 37. : Compounded of many precious ingredients; and poured forth into eight vessels, or treatises, for the use, and benefit of the church of Christ, until his second coming. / By J.H. ; The contents of the eight treatises, which you may read in the two following pages.
titleStmt.author: Harrington, James, Sir, 1607-1680.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Sir James Harrington by Wing.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Includes manuscript notes on Yeates family between p. 250 and p. 251.
Reproduction of original in: Birmingham Central Reference Library.
